item.title: Notes-Up "GitHub" theme
item.description: This is a simple theme to make Notes-Up look like GitHub markdown. Adaptation of sindresorhus/github-markdown-css for Notes-Up. Installation Open Preferences Click viewer Download the CSS below and enter in “Global style modifications” Click close Enjoy the new look! Theme Download the theme License View license
item.content:encoded:
This is a simple theme to make Notes-Up look like GitHub markdown. Adaptation of sindresorhus/github-markdown-css for Notes-Up.

Installation

  • Open Preferences
  • Click viewer
  • Download the CSS below and enter in “Global style modifications”
  • Click close
  • Enjoy the new look!

Theme

Download the theme

License

View license
